# DEPARTMENT OF STATE TELEGRAM
**UNCLASSIFIED**

::: {.cable-meta}
:::


Message Text




 221646Z


46
ACTION ARA-10


INFO OCT-01 ISO-00 AID-07 IGA-02 SY-04 /024 W
           --------------------- 013046
R 221328Z APR 74
FM AMEMBASSY LA PAZ
TO SECSTATE WASHDC 2887


UNCLAS LA PAZ 2490


E.O. 11652: N/A
SUBJ: DOUGLAS, ROBERT P S CONTRACT


REF: STATE 072515


USAID SENT FOLLOWING CABLE TO DOUGLAS QUOTE USAID/BOLIVIA WILL
SIGN PERSONAL SERVICE CONTRACT WITH YOU FOR UP TO FOUR WEEKS AT
150 DOLLARS PER WORKING DAY PLUS STANDARD U.S. GOVERNMENT PER
DIEM. YOU ARE TO PERFORM CONSULTATION ON HEALTH FACILITIES AND
EQUIPMENT. REQUEST YOU PROCEED TO BOLIVIA ABOUT APRIL 27 AT
YOUR EXPENSE REIMBURSABLE IN LA PAZ. BRING MEDICAL CHECK-UP
ADVISE UNQUOTE
ASSUME DOUGLASS HAS CURRENT SECURITY CLEARANCE UNDER PSC WITH
USAID/C.
STEDMAN








NNN
